Duluth.Gerald W. Heaney Federal Building, Unite: The Gerald W. Heaney Federal Building, United States Courthouse and Custom House in Duluth, Minnesota is a courthouse of the United States District Court for the District of Minnesota. Completed in 1930, it is part of the Duluth Civic Center Historic District, listed in the National Register of Historic Places in 1986. In 2007, the United States Congress passed an act to rename the building for former District Court judge Gerald Heaney.
